text: @realDonaldTrump The stock market means little to people who lost their 401Ks when they lost their jobs. It means little to those who lost their investments when the market fell during the early days of the COVID-19 crisis. The stock market is a terrible indicator of economic health.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
